name: Lock Craker
description:
Inspired by LockPickingLawyer

3 different types of locks

Safe Dial

  • Needs 3 different numbers to open
  • Numbers are randomized

Rotary Password Lock

  • 5 slots of 5 numbers
  • Correct numbers are randomized

LockPicking

  • 5 different pins to push
  • Need to push the pins in a sequence
  • Sequence will be randomized
MAGES Institute of Excellence

Dirac Sea was developed over a 6 week period by DGDT Student Eugene Fong as part of the Game Audio Programming Module.
